edu.doane.dugal.dea.kits.bchrom

Class PointCrossover

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.doane.dugal.dea.kits.bchrom.PointCrossover
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Operator

    public class PointCrossover
extends java.lang.Object
implements Operator
    Class to perform single-point crossover on BinaryChromosome individuals. Iterate through a population. With probability chi, an individual undergoes crossover. When this happens, select a random mate, select a random crossover point, and exchange bits between the individuals after that point.
    Version:
    12/30/2014
    Author:
    Mark M. Meysenburg

        public PointCrossover()
        Default constructor. Create a PointCrossover operator with probability of crossover 0.6.

                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Set the probability that an individual undergoes crossover.

        Throws:

      • operate

        public void operate(java.util.ArrayList<Individual> population)
        Perform the point crossover operation on a population of BinaryChromosome individuals. Iterate through the population. With probability chi, an individual undergoes crossover. When this happens, select a random mate, select a random crossover point, and exchange bits between the individuals after that point.
        Specified by:
        operate in interface Operator
        Parameters:
        population - ArrayList of BinaryChromosome individuals to work on.
